title: Movie Recommended System
description: This project is content-based Movie Recommender System. This system suggests movies based on user preferences using cosine similarity and a preprocessed dataset.

title: Colloberative Music Play
description: This project is a full-stack web application integrating the Spotify API for real-time music playback. Users can create and join rooms to control music collaboratively.

title: Student Exam Performance Predictor
description: This project is a movie review application that will feature a separation of concerns between the client code and the server code.

title: Movie-Reviews-Application
description: This project is a movie review application that will feature a separation of concerns between the client code and the server code.
